verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H5146>Noah<s%>, <S%H935>Come<s%> thou and all thy <S%H1004>house<s%> into the <S%H8392>ark<s%>; for thee have I <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H6662>righteous<s%> before <S%H6440>me<s%> in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1755>generation<s%>.

Of every <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H929>beast<s%> thou shalt <S%H3947>take<s%> to thee by <S%H7651%H7651>sevens<s%>, the <S%H376>male<s%> and his <S%H802>female<s%>: and of <S%H929>beasts<s%> that are not <S%H2889%H1931>clean<s%> by <S%H8147>two<s%>, the <S%H376>male<s%> and his <S%H802>female<s%>.

Of <S%H5775>fowls<s%> also of the <S%H8064>air<s%> by <S%H7651%H7651>sevens<s%>, the <S%H2145>male<s%> and the <S%H5347>female<s%>; to <S%H2421>keep<s%> <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H2421>alive<s%> upon the <S%H6440>face<s%> of all the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

For <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>, and I will cause it to <S%H4305>rain<s%> upon the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> and <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3915>nights<s%>; and <S%H3605>every<s%> living <S%H3351>substance<s%> that I have <S%H6213>made<s%> will I <S%H4229>destroy<s%> from <S%H5921>off<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H127>earth<s%>.
And <S%H5146>Noah<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> according unto all that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> him.
And <S%H5146>Noah<s%> was <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when the <S%H3999>flood<s%> of <S%H4325>waters<s%> was upon the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

¶ And <S%H5146>Noah<s%> went <S%H935>in<s%>, and his <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and his <S%H802>wife<s%>, and his <S%H1121>sons'<s%> <S%H802>wives<s%> with him, into the <S%H8392>ark<s%>, because <S%H6440>of<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of the <S%H3999>flood<s%>.

Of <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H929>beasts<s%>, and of <S%H929>beasts<s%> that are not <S%H2889>clean<s%>, and of <S%H5775>fowls<s%>, and of every thing that <S%H7430>creepeth<s%> upon the <S%H127>earth<s%>,

There went <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> unto <S%H5146>Noah<s%> into the <S%H8392>ark<s%>, the <S%H2145>male<s%> and the <S%H5347>female<s%>, <S%H834>as<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H5146>Noah<s%>.
And it came to pass after <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>, that the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of the <S%H3999>flood<s%> were upon the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

¶ <S%H8141>In<s%> the <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundredth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H5146>Noah's<s%> <S%H2416>life<s%>, in the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%>, the <S%H7651%H6240>seventeenth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H2320>month<s%>, the <S%H2088>same<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> were all the <S%H4599>fountains<s%> of the <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H8415>deep<s%> broken <S%H1234>up<s%>, and the <S%H699>windows<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> were <S%H6605>opened<s%>.
And the <S%H1653>rain<s%> was upon the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> and <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3915>nights<s%>.

In the <S%H6106>selfsame<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H935>entered<s%> <S%H5146>Noah<s%>, and <S%H8035>Shem<s%>, and <S%H2526>Ham<s%>, and <S%H3315>Japheth<s%>, the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5146>Noah<s%>, and <S%H5146>Noah's<s%> <S%H802>wife<s%>, and the <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H802>wives<s%> of his <S%H1121>sons<s%> with them, into the <S%H8392>ark<s%>;

<S%H1992>They<s%>, and every <S%H2416>beast<s%> after his <S%H4327>kind<s%>, and all the <S%H929>cattle<s%> after their <S%H4327>kind<s%>, and every creeping <S%H7431>thing<s%> that <S%H7430>creepeth<s%> upon the <S%H776>earth<s%> after his <S%H4327>kind<s%>, and every <S%H5775>fowl<s%> after his <S%H4327>kind<s%>, every <S%H6833>bird<s%> of every <S%H3671>sort<s%>.

And they went <S%H935>in<s%> unto <S%H5146>Noah<s%> into the <S%H8392>ark<s%>, <S%H8147>two<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> of all <S%H1320>flesh<s%>, <S%H834>wherein<s%> is the <S%H7307>breath<s%> of <S%H2416>life<s%>.

And they that went <S%H935>in<s%>, went <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H2145>male<s%> and <S%H5347>female<s%> of all <S%H1320>flesh<s%>, as <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> him: and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shut him <S%H5462>in<s%>.

And the <S%H3999>flood<s%> was <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> upon the <S%H776>earth<s%>; and the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H7235>increased<s%>, and bare <S%H5375>up<s%> the <S%H8392>ark<s%>, and it was lift <S%H7311>up<s%> above the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

And the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H1396>prevailed<s%>, and were <S%H7235>increased<s%> <S%H3966>greatly<s%> upon the <S%H776>earth<s%>; and the <S%H8392>ark<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> upon the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H4325>waters<s%>.

And the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H1396>prevailed<s%> <S%H3966%H3966>exceedingly<s%> upon the <S%H776>earth<s%>; and all the <S%H1364>high<s%> <S%H2022>hills<s%>, that were <S%H8478>under<s%> the whole <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, were <S%H3680>covered<s%>.
<S%H6240%H2568>Fifteen<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H4605>upward<s%> did the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H1396>prevail<s%>; and the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> were <S%H3680>covered<s%>.

And all <S%H1320>flesh<s%> <S%H1478>died<s%> that <S%H7430>moved<s%> upon the <S%H776>earth<s%>, both of <S%H5775>fowl<s%>, and of <S%H929>cattle<s%>, and of <S%H2416>beast<s%>, and of every creeping <S%H8318>thing<s%> that <S%H8317>creepeth<s%> upon the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and every <S%H120>man<s%>:
All in whose <S%H639>nostrils<s%> was the <S%H5397%H7307>breath<s%> of <S%H2416>life<s%>, of all that was in the <S%H2724>dry<s%> land, <S%H4191>died<s%>.

And every living <S%H3351>substance<s%> was <S%H4229>destroyed<s%> which was upon the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H127>ground<s%>, both <S%H120>man<s%>, and <S%H929>cattle<s%>, and the creeping <S%H7431>things<s%>, and the <S%H5775>fowl<s%> of the <S%H8064>heaven<s%>; and they were <S%H4229>destroyed<s%> from the <S%H776>earth<s%>: and <S%H5146>Noah<s%> <S%H389>only<s%> <S%H7604>remained<s%> alive, and they <S%H834>that<s%> were with him in the <S%H8392>ark<s%>.
And the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H1396>prevailed<s%> upon the <S%H776>earth<s%> an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>.
